query:
UPDATE island_guides 
SET topThingsToDo = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ„ Surfing at Jailbreak', 'description', 'Home break, 5-minute walk from island, free access, right-hander with 3 sections, intermediate to advanced, 3-6 feet typical'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸŒŠ Surfing at Sultans', 'description', 'Across channel, fast right-hander, 2 sections with barrels, 200m rides, advanced surfers, usually crowded'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ–ï¸ Surfing at Honkys', 'description', 'Left-hand point break, mellow first peak, long perfect rides, beginner-friendly, ideal for learning'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ‘™ Bikini Beach Relaxation', 'description', 'Only designated bikini area on island, white sandy beaches, crystalline waters, sunbeds available'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸš£ Water Sports', 'description', 'Kayaking ($10/hour), jet skiing, parasailing, wakeboarding, windsurfing, underwater scooter rentals'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ¤¿ Scuba Diving', 'description', 'PADI dive centers available (Feena Dive), various dive sites in area, good for all levels'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ  Snorkeling Safari', 'description', 'Clear warm water, diverse marine life, rays, sharks, tropical fish daily, directly from beaches'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ£ Night Fishing', 'description', 'Game fish like trevallies, snappers, groupers, fish can be cooked at guesthouse'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ¬ Dolphin Cruise', 'description', 'Spinner dolphins with aerial acrobatics, fun diving experience, memorable encounters'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ¨ Resort Day Visits', 'description', 'Day trips to nearby resorts with lunch and drinks included, experience luxury resort amenities')
),
foodCafes = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'ğŸ½ï¸ Ovary', 'description', 'Local restaurant with authentic Maldivian cuisine'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'â˜• Ammaley Cafe', 'description', 'Casual cafe with snacks and beverages'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'ğŸŒ… Sea Breeze Cafe', 'description', 'Beachfront cafe with ocean views'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'ğŸ¥– Bun Me', 'description', 'Bakery with fresh pastries and bread')
),
faq = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸ„ Is surfing good here?', 'answer', 'Yes! Himmafushi is famous for surfing with multiple world-class breaks suitable for all levels. Best season is March-October.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸ›ï¸ Where can I stay?', 'answer', 'Budget guesthouses range from $30-50/night. Book in advance during peak season.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸš¤ How do I get here?', 'description', 'Speedboat from Male: 20 minutes ($15-20). Ferry: 1.5 hours ($2-3).'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸ’° What is the budget?', 'answer', 'Budget travelers: $40-60/day. Mid-range: $80-120/day. Includes accommodation, food, and activities.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸŒŠ Is it safe?', 'answer', 'Yes, very safe. Clean, organized local island with friendly residents and low crime rates.')
)
WHERE name = 'Himmafushi'
